name: Evi Industries, Inc.
description: Evi Industries, Inc. is a leading provider of service and repair solutions for the commercial laundry and dry cleaning industries. Founded in 1965, the company has established itself as a trusted partner for businesses seeking innovative and efficient equipment solutions. Evi specializes in the distribution of high-quality laundry and dry cleaning machinery, offering a comprehensive range of products from top manufacturers. The company also provides extensive service and support to ensure optimal operation and maintenance of equipment. With a strong focus on customer satisfaction, Evi Industries is dedicated to delivering tailored solutions that enhance productivity and operational efficiency for its clients. The company’s commitment to quality and service excellence has earned it a solid reputation in the industry, allowing it to build long-lasting relationships with customers across the United States. Evi Industries continues to expand its product offerings and service capabilities, leveraging the latest technology to meet the evolving needs of the market. As the demand for efficient laundry services grows, Evi remains poised to innovate and lead in this specialized sector.
